resources.string: This application lets you manage the status of the service
This app can\'t run on your device
Sorry, it appears that this application cannot control your WiFi radio. Thank you for participating in the study, but your device is unable to contribute data to the project at this time.

This application requires the ability to use your device\'s GPS at certain times throughout the day. Enabling GPS does not actually turn on the unit or waste battery. Other apps that use GPS frequently may hinder your battery life, it is recommended you terminate these apps if you are able to.
This app only uses GPS when necessary.\nPlease enable GPS
Please enable GPS\nPress the back button for more information
